name: Paper Punchout
description:
Remember the fighting game ideas you doodled during Pre-Algebra in your middle school notebook? Well, we made them into a reality with “Paper Punchout”.

Fight head-to-head against your friends by punching with your arm. The stronger the hit, the higher the score. Whoever reaches 100 points first wins, but be careful - your opponent will score big if they knock your head off, so be sure to decapitate them before they decapitate you!

Choose among four different characters and plug in your Xbox One controllers for the definitive local multiplayer experience, and be sure to turn up the volume for stereo sound and music.

With a unique control system, a cast of colorful characters, and a hard-rockin’ soundtrack, “Paper Punchout” is a new approach to fighting games you wouldn’t want to miss.
